title: agate
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20141002102328/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20141002102328/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Agate**

The agate is a unit of measurement that has been traditionally used to measure the vertical space [(gutter)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141002102328/http:/typophile.com/wiki/%28gutter%29) between columns in a newspaper. Fourteen agates is approximately the equivalent of one inch.
author: track and kern
